game_description: Edge Factor's Virtual Reality Experiences are all about experiential learning. VR takes this to the next level, giving students a closer look at interests and industries during their career exploration. Learn about industries from around the country. Experience tours and demonstrations with industry professionals. Interact with objects, inspect life-size models, and discover a whole new way to learn. Explore gamified experiences with quizzes, challenges, and experimentation to ignite a passion for learning and career exploration. Virtual Reality = High Impact Experiential Learning An existing Edge Factor membership is required to access.
review_2: i download then i have to buy a membership
